description: Defines the LocalSqliteDataSource class which implements the DataSource interface for local SQLite data storage, providing methods for CRUD operations on vehicles, groups, and events.

classes.name: LocalSqliteDataSource
classes.description: Implements the DataSource interface to manage local SQLite database interactions for vehicles, groups, and events.

methods.name: initialize
methods.description: Initializes the SQLite database, including schema setup and migrations.

methods.name: getVehicles
methods.description: Fetches a list of all stored Vehicle objects.

methods.name: createVehicle
methods.description: Creates and stores a new Vehicle object in the database.

methods.name: updateVehicle
methods.description: Updates an existing Vehicle object in the database.

methods.name: deleteVehicle
methods.description: Deletes a Vehicle entry by its ID.

methods.name: getGroups
methods.description: Fetches a list of all stored BusinessGroup objects.

methods.name: createGroup
methods.description: Creates and stores a new BusinessGroup object.

methods.name: deleteGroup
methods.description: Deletes a BusinessGroup entry by its ID.

methods.name: getEvents
methods.description: Fetches a list of all stored MaintenanceEvent objects.

methods.name: createEvent
methods.description: Creates and stores a new MaintenanceEvent object.

methods.name: deleteEvent
methods.description: Deletes a MaintenanceEvent entry by its ID.
